featured.text: People who are determined cannot be easily stopped from doing what they want to do.
Whoever dropped the shoe must have been a brave and determined woman.

definition.zh_def: 堅定的，決心的，不屈不撓的。
definition.en_def: Having made a firm decision and not letting anything prevent you from doing it.
definition.example: She was determined to finish the race, no matter how tired she felt.
